attributes.action: introducing self defence in all schools across UK for boys and girls
attributes.additional_details: Add it to the school curriculum
attributes.background: I want the government/Parliament to have a look into adding martial arts/self defence for boys and girls into the school curriculum as I think it would help with abductions and maybe some of the gang violence/knife crime in the UK

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make self-defence lessons mandatory in schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329261
